title: Gum Disease Treatment | Dentist in Crystal, MN
description: We are happy to provide gum disease treatment in Crystal, MN, for patients with periodontal disease. Meet with our dentists today to learn more.
cleaned_text: Periodontal disease, also known as gum disease, is more common than you might think. In fact, the harmful bacteria that can lead to periodontal disease are a fairly normal part of your mouth and smile. If you are experiencing gum disease symptoms, we offer gum disease treatment in Crystal, Minnesota, so you can enjoy a healthy smile. Give Alpine Dental a call at 763-536-1118 to schedule a visit with our dentists, Dr. Kevan
